summary.para: Contains information used by to identify the icon for which to retrieve the bounding rectangle.

remarks.para: The icon can be identified to through this structure in two ways:
If guidItem is not GUID_NULL, hWnd and uID are ignored.

summary.para: The size of this structure, in bytes.
A handle to the parent window used by the notification's callback function. For more information, see the hWnd member of the structure.
The application-defined identifier of the notification icon. Multiple icons can be associated with a single hWnd, each with their own uID.
A registered GUID that identifies the icon. Use GUID_NULL if the icon is not identified by a GUID.
